segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, it's full of little stories.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on drying the dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Towel bunched up, plate gleaming under the light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's betrayalâ€”endless water flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in the puddle, utterly unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Children misbehaving, boy climbing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in the jar, grabbing sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl assisting, arm raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This sneaky operation could go wrong fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden peaceful, inside total hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the potential mess ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone turn off that water before disaster!
segments.speaker: PAR
